notesStmt.note: In prose segment (chapter II) columns are internally consecutive; in the poetic segment each verse is split between the columns; Fol. 1 contains Job II 4 יתן בעד - III 26 שלותי ולא; in missing part of fol. were III 4-7 and the latter phrases of III 24, to end of chapter; fol. 2 contains ibid., VII 8 לא תשורני - VIII 22 ר]שע]ים]; in missing part of fol. were VII 20-VIII 7 and approximately IX 1-11; only text break signified graphically follows III 1.
Condition: damage, lacking right edge; losses along left edge; occasional Arabic words on verso in blank area.losses: fol. 1 lacking bottom [3-4] lines; fol. 2 lacking bottom [8-10] lines.
